select.if: SELECT T.ID AS "id",'-1' AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.ORGLEVEL = '1'
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'false' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T WHERE T.USER_CODE=#{user_code} AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{deal_date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON SELECT T6.ID,T6.REALNAME,T6.USERNAME,T6.PHONE,T5.GROUP_ID_4,2,T5.UNIT_ID,T5.GROUP_ID_1,T5.HQ_CHAN_CODE,T5.UNIT_NAME, T7.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,SYSDATE,'','',1,T5.GROUP_ID_4_NAME,#{user_code},T3.USER_LOGIN_NAME,#{hr_id},#{f_hr_id},#{username}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),'',1,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM PTEMP.TAB_USER T2 JOIN PTEMP.TAB_EMPLOYEE T3 ON (T2.EMPLOYEE_ID=T3.EMPLOYEE_ID) JOIN PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_CODE T4 ON (T2.DEPT_ID=T4.BSS_CHNL_CODE) JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T5 ON (T4.HQ_CHAN_CODE=T5.HQ_CHAN_CODE) JOIN PORTAL.APDP_USER T6 ON (#{hr_id}=T6.HR_ID) JOIN PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T7 ON (T5.GROUP_ID_1=T7.GROUP_ID_1) WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T7 WHERE #{user_code}=T7.USER_CODE and T7.USER_TYPE=2 AND T7.DEAL_DATE=#{deal_date}) AND #{user_code}=T2.USER_CODE
mapper.update: MERGE INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T2 USING PORTAL.APDP_USER T3 ON (T2.HR_ID=T3.HR_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T2.NAME=T3.REALNAME,T2.USERID=T3.ID,T2.PHONE=T3.PHONE,T2.ACCOUNT=T3.USERNAME WHERE T2.DEAL_DATE=#{deal_date} AND T2.USER_CODE=#{user_code}
